action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors scattered on a white background. There is a purple plus sign, green L-shaped pieces, pink T-shaped pieces, and orange L-shaped pieces. The shapes are not connected to each other and are positioned randomly.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of several pixelated shapes in different colors on a white background. There are green, purple, pink, and orange shapes arranged in a seemingly random pattern. The shapes are blocky and resemble pieces from a pixel art or a retro video game.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors scattered on a white background. There is a purple plus sign, green L-shaped pieces, pink T-shaped pieces, and orange L-shaped pieces. The shapes are not connected to each other and are positioned randomly.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any shapes in your image that have a small square cut out from their middle?

QUESTION: Are there any plus-shaped pieces in your image?
